attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why are there poor straight haired blond / blonde, blue/grey eyed white people?
 
It is reasonable to expect that Institutional (Organised) Racism, which is White Supremacy, would favour the Whitetest of the White people.
 
To have poor, pure blood, straight haired blond / blonde, blue/grey eyed white people in an Institutionally Racist environment is evidence that there has been blatant disregard and disrespect for the finest specimens of the Supreme White Race by those classified as lower life value, darker haired, darker eyed white people visibly contaminated with non-white blood.
 
The Race Equality Secret Service (RESS) works to solve the problems caused for ALL people by White Supremacist ideology via the system of Institutional (Organised) Racism.

Can you feel The Power?

Alchemy Rising.
 
What say you?
attributes.creator_name: Derrick Lynch - Race Equality Secret Service

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
